explains: adj. 激烈的；狂暴的；偏激的；患狂犬病的

sentences.en: The party has distanced itself from the more rabid nationalist groups in the country.
sentences.cn: 该党与国内各种激进的民族主义团体保持了距离。

sentences.en: the likelihood of the implicated animal being rabid
sentences.cn: 该动物携带狂犬病毒的可能性；

sentences.en: Rabid animals on the loose frequent our TVs and newsfeeds.
sentences.cn: 患有狂犬病的动物经常成为电视或新闻的主角。
